title: Profile Background Customization
body:
To begin with, I'd like to express how awesome the new profile user interface looks, quite clean and simple. The client team is moving in the right direction on the whole.

Despite this, I have a suggestion. According to the main post, the current plan for your profile background is to show the champion you've recently played. Instead of this, much like selecting your champion icon, the player has the option to select their profile background. Within this pool, you can select images of splashes of champions and skins you own, perhaps including other League art (such as that of Summoner's Rift or eSports events). Perhaps you could even make backgrounds available in the Store for a small amount of IP.

Without proper customization, profiles don't feel as personal as they should. I think this is a pretty good idea in order to ensure that quality is met with the new client.

Thanks for the positive feedback!!

Oh, I saw that post! Also saw a Rioter that sought to consider the idea I made above, just wanted to make a master post for this idea.

I had mentioned above that I did not like the direction of using your most recently played champion, as sometimes metas shift who you can or are available to play, and you'd rather feature a specific champion you really like! I haven't been a huge fan of the Recently Played system (since, in my experience, it doesn't work that well.)

Appreciate the response and your effort to listen to us :)
